::Dark Lavatron::

      "Yesssss........We will join your forces!!!!  We can serve a great
deal to your destruction wishes!!" Dark Lavatron said, cackling evilly.

       Dark Lavatron awaited a positive answer, yes, the Dark Lavacons would
prove a valuable asset.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 30, 2000 11:53 PM
Subject: Re: Dunnna na na na, dunna na na na!!!(Dooms Day!)


> ::Zardus/Oblitertron::
>
> Oblitertron growls at Dark Lavatron, raising his weapon, about to open
fire.
> Out of the corner of his eyes, he sees Zardus motioning for him to back
off.
> Reluctantly, Dark One takes a step back, watching Zardus fly forward.
>
> Oblitertron had been looking forward to killing these puny bots, maybe
battle
> would still be possible....
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus looks at Lavatron, thinking the offer over. Bots like these could
be
> an asset, yesss...
>
> "What kind of alliance do you have in mind?" Zardus asks mindly, his
weapon
> ready just in case, "You joining us?"
>
>
>
>
